author: Bill Hutchinson
title: Las Vegas mayor slammed for suggesting workers could be COVID-19 'control group'
description: The Culinary Workers union said Sin City is "not a Petri dish."
content: Las Vegas casino and restaurant workers have pushed back on Mayor Carolyn Goodman's repeated calls to reopen the city's economy, and now local labor unions are outraged after she admitted in a nationally televised interview to suggesting laborers serve as vir… [+3624 chars]
